name: Spicy Eggplant and Pasta with Pancetta
author: Andrew Bleiman
summary: Eggplant has its fans and its detractors. Even the most devoutly anti-eggplant zealot can't resist this savory combination of spicy eggplant, pancetta, and pasta.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste
2 teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste
1 teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste
1 pinch white sugar, or to taste  (Optional)
1 pinch ground white pepper, or to taste
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add pancetta; cook until browned on the edges, about 5 minutes
Add eggplant and remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil; cook until eggplant is slightly softened, about 5 minutes
Pour marinara sauce, tomatoes, and wine into the skillet
Add red pepper flakes, black pepper, garlic salt, sugar, and white pepper
Let sauce simmer until flavors combine, about 20 minutes
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
